sentence.text: Four established melanoma susceptibility genes achieved nominal statistical significance, MC1R (p = .0014), positive regulation of gene expression (p = .0165) mitotic cytokinesis (p = .0206), and nicotinamide riboside catabolic process (p = .0393).
We also observed a suggestive association for DNA repair (p = .002), a gene previously implicated in melanoma survival.

Although MC1R carriers were represented proportionally among the four molecular tumor subcardiac muscle tissue developments, these individuals accounted for 69% of ultraviolet (UV) radiation mutational signatures among triple-wild type tumors (p = .040), highlighting the increased sensitivity to UV exposure among individuals with loss-of-function variants in MC1R
